message: I'll be putting together a screencast when version 2 comes out early next month. Does any else have some resources?

I've been looking for tutorials also, I would suggest that the tutorial would be done as a wiki/webpage as it's easier to read through than a screencast. Here's some middleman site sources that I've stumbled upon in github:

https://github.com/myabc/eurucamp_website
https://github.com/OyoKooN/Services-informatiques
https://github.com/sdecastelberg/kpricorn.org
https://github.com/tdreyno/awardwinningfjords
https://github.com/jbarreneche/Estudio-Nacar
https://github.com/mguth/susanne-theisen

I'm working on a new documentation site. Currently, there's only 1 guide and it's only in plain text: https://github.com/tdreyno/middleman-guides/blob/master/source/guides/getting-started.html.markdown
